段: 貓講會展威，虎講會[口+束]血啦！貓較巧。虎招貓仔講：「貓仔！你來教我展威好毋？我才教你[口+束]血。」彼隻貓仔講：「好哦！」

niau kong2 e7 tian2-ui, hou2 kong2 e7 suh-huih lah! niau khah khiau2. hou2 chio niau-a2 kong2: “niau-a2! li2 lai5 ka3 goa2 tian2-ui ho2 m7? goa2 chiah ka3 li2 suh-huih.” hit chiah niau-a2 kong2: “ho2 ouh!”
彼隻貓講：「你著先教我。」伊講、彼隻虎講：「你著先教我。」貓講：「你較大隻，我先教你，你、你若毋教我，我那此句意為？你赫大隻，我細仔隻，你毋教我，哈一下，無夠你一嘴。」彼隻虎講：「有影哦！」

hit chiah niau kong2: “li2 tioh8 seng ka3 goa2.” i kong2, hit chiah hou2 kong2: “li2 tioh8 seng ka3 goa2.” niau kong2: “li2 khah toa7-chiah, goa2 seng ka3 li2, li2, li2 na7 m7 ka3 goa2, goa2 na2 chu2 ku3 i3 ui5? li2 hiah toa7-chiah, goa2 soe3-a2 chiah, li2 m7 ka3 goa2, hap8 chit8-e7, bo5-kau3 li2 chit8 chhui3.” hit chiah hou2 kong2: “u7-iann2--ouh!”
彼隻虎才教伊[口+束]血。貓若咬著貓鼠流血，四界流，你無看，攏予伊[口+束] [口+束]去。啊伊彼隻貓聽候教會啊，就安爾，噗咧！對樹仔頂起，彼貓會[走@百]樹仔，[走@百]對樹仔頭起。啊彼隻虎戇戇，得卜共喫彼樹頭，得卜共喫予倒，佇彼戇戇仔喫、戇戇仔喫，貓仔毋知走過、跳過幾仔欉去啊！「彼隻戇虎。」

hit chiah hou2 chiah ka3 i suh-huih. niau na7 ka7 tioh8 niau2-chhi2 be7 lau5-huih, be7 si3-koe3 lau5, li2 bo5 khoann3, long2 hou7 i suh-suh khi3. a i hit chiah niau theng3-hau7 ka3 e7 ah, chiu7 an2-ni, phok8 leh! tui3 chhiu7-a2-teng2 khi2, he niau e7 peh chhiu7-a2, peh tui3 chhiu7-a2-thau5 khi2. a hit chiah hou2 gong7-gong7, teh beh ka7 khoeh he chhiu7-thau5, teh beh ka7 khoeh hou7 to2, ti7 hia gong7-gong7-a2 khoeh, gong7-gong7-a2 khoeh, niau-a2 m7 chai chau2--ke3, thiau3 koe3 kui2-a chang5 khi3--ah! “hit chiah gong7 hou2.”
彼隻虎講：「好哦！彼隻貓今也若予我看著，tsham5貓屎麼無通拍損！」彼貓講：「我tsham5屎麼無卜予你看。」貓放屎攏藏咧，抓抓咧才放。

hit chiah hou2 kong2: “ho2--ouh! hit chiah niau chit-ma2 na7 hou7 goa2 khoann3--tioh8, chham5 niau-sai2 ma7 bo5 thang phah-sng2!” he niau kong2: “goa2 chham5 sai2 ma7 bo5 beh hou7 li2 khoann3.” niau pang3-sai2 long2 chhang3 leh, jiau3-jiau3 leh chiah pang3.
